DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective chart review/data collection study of natural orifice translumenal endoscopic surgery (NOTES) for sleeve gastrectomy, that will include questionnaires administered throughout the study. Subjects enrolled will be those intending to have a transvaginal NOTES sleeve gastrectomy. Data will be collected and reviewed through 12 months post-op.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion: 1. Diagnosis of morbid obesity BMI > 40 2. Female, age 1875 3. Mentally competent to give informed consent 4. Scheduled to undergo a transvaginal NOTES sleeve gastrectomy Exclusion: 1. Pregnant women 2. BMI < 40
